original_title: Dan Baird & Homemade Sin: Battleship Chains
overview: Features the hits, "Battleship Chains" and "I Love You Period" Recorded Live at J.B.'s Dudley 5th October 2005 with a guest appearance by Spike from the Quireboys on the last 2 tracks
title: Dan Baird & Homemade Sin: Battleship Chains
